trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> o <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllare le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> le modifiche alle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler>, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere l'articolo [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Il codice seguente viene illustrato come gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento.
